xanax.gloss: an antianxiety agent (trade name Xanax) of the benzodiazepine class

xanthemia.gloss: excess carotene in the blood stream

xanthium.gloss: coarse herbs having small heads of greenish flowers followed by burrs with hooked bristles

xanthoma multiplex.gloss: widespread xanthomas (especially on elbows and knees)

xanthomatosis.gloss: widespread xanthomas (especially on elbows and knees)

xanthomonas.gloss: a genus of bacteria similar to Pseudomonas but producing a yellow pigment that is not soluble in water

xanthophyl.gloss: yellow carotenoid pigments in plants and animal fats and egg yolks

xanthophyll.gloss: yellow carotenoid pigments in plants and animal fats and egg yolks

xanthorrhoeaceae.gloss: one of many subfamilies into which some classification systems subdivide the Liliaceae but not widely accepted

xanthosoma atrovirens.gloss: tropical American aroid having edible tubers that are cooked and eaten like yams or potatoes

xanthosoma sagittifolium.gloss: tropical American aroid having edible tubers that are cooked and eaten like yams or potatoes

xavier.gloss: Spanish missionary and Jesuit who establish missionaries in Japan and Ceylon and the East Indies (1506-1552)

xanthous.gloss: of the color intermediate between green and orange in the color spectrum
